doc.field: Riley, Annie, Miss: Nine Letters to [ALS] Contents: three are addressed to AR in Sheffield, England, six to AR in Massachusetts (Townsend Centre, Jamaica Plain); the last letter is addressed to Nurse A.P. Riley
